title: is there a live chat with riot?
body: Hello, i just recieved five 20 minute penalties for being afk, but i was indeed in the game. I find t his highly unfair so i wish to speak to riot and get this overturned.

replies.body: hi there, I am Jace and i am not happy with my rank of S6. I won 7 out 10 games and they thrown me in bronze 5 which really sucks. what is the meaning of resetting rank then?

Unfortunately, LeaverBuster punishments cannot be reversed. It's an automated system that detects whether you were AFK from the match for a certain period of time, and there's little to no chance that punishments are incorrectly applied. For more information about LeaverBuster, check out the [**LeaverBuster FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)!
